channel.title: Changing home
channel.description: Im using team torva base and client and ive searched client.java and config.java but i cant fine home in any of those to change the cords im new to java so thank you :D

item.title: Changing home

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

[quote=“Aaroninsane, post:3, topic:412077”]i changed em and home didnt change i compiled also ill try 1 more time

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2957; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3214; public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3351; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3343; public static final int DUNG_RESPAWN_X = 3351; // when dead respawn here public static final int DUNG_RESPAWN_Y = 3343; public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263; public static final int RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN = 5; // random coords home is still edgy tho D:[/quote]

Umm I don’t really know why is not working… TeamTorva is a leech from Final Judgement, am using FJ and thats how I change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing home

i changed em and home didnt change i compiled also ill try 1 more time

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2957; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3214; public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3351; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3343; public static final int DUNG_RESPAWN_X = 3351; // when dead respawn here public static final int DUNG_RESPAWN_Y = 3343; public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263; public static final int RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN = 5; // random coords home is still edgy tho D: also i cant log in

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

Config class

Folder>src>server>config.java

On Config.java search for:

It should look like this:

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = XXXX; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = YYYY;

Just change it to your new coords.

Read full topic
